mapper.sql: id, t_id, project, standard, `require`, result, evaluate, remark, create_time, catagory, exp_no
mapper.insert: insert into pf_result (t_id, project, standard, `require`, result, evaluate, remark, create_time, catagory, exp_no) values (#{tId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{project,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{standard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{require,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{result,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{evaluate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{catagory,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{expNo,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update:
update pf_result
t_id = #{tId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
project = #{project,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
standard = #{standard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`require` = #{require,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
result = #{result,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
evaluate = #{evaluate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
catagory = #{catagory,jdbcType=INTEGER},
exp_no = #{expNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert:
insert into pf_result (t_id, project, standard, `require`, result, evaluate, remark, create_time, catagory, exp_no) values
(#{item.tId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.project,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.standard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.require,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.result,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.evaluate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.catagory,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.expNo,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select count(distinct exp_no) num from pf_result where t_id = #{taskId} and catagory = #{catagory}
